DOC.brief_summary: This prospective randomized study aim evaluate effectiveness intravenous lidocaine injection relief pain patient undergoing tonsillectomy . A total 62 patient randomized one two group ( group C group I ) base Excel number generation . Patients group C receive receive normal saline intravenous injection , patient group I receive intravenous bolus injection 1.5 mg/kg lidocaine follow continuous lidocaine infusion 2 mg/kg/hr . Visual analogue scale pain score , fentanyl consumption frequency patient push button ( FPB ) patient-controlled analgesia system record 4 , 12 , 24 , 48 hour postoperatively .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Intravenous Lidocaine Pain After Tonsillectomy
DOC.criteria: Tonsillectomy mental change allergy local anesthetic
